    public static class Symbolic.Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    Debugging helpers for interaction with the Java Symbolic Simulator

      • abort

        public static void abort()
        Abort simulation on all paths and terminate. When invoked in a standard JVM, this function does nothing.

      • dumpPathState

        public static void dumpPathState()
        Print the path state currently being simulated to stdout. When invoked in a standard JVM, this function does nothing.

      • setVerbosity

        public static void setVerbosity(int level)
        Set debug verbosity to the requested level. When invoked in a standard JVM, this function does nothing.
